10 (1) REM TEST OPTION DECIMALS STATEMENT
12 (1) OPTION PRECISION 16
20 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
30 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 15
40 (15) OPTION DECIMALS I
50 (15) PRINT A
60 (15) NEXT I
99 (1) END
